ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.bo

Class ResourceList

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.tools.List
      • ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.bo.ResourceList

  • public class ResourceList
extends List
    This class is used by various other classes that need to keep a list of resources on hand. It extends the List class which provides the basic functionality for storage and retrieval of the Resource Object from the list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceList

        public ResourceList()

    • Method Detail

      • addResource

        public void addResource(Resource resource)
        Adds a new resource to the list. All the issues of casting are taken care of within this class.
        Parameters:
        resource -

      • getNextResource

        public Resource getNextResource()
        Returns:
        The resource at the current position pointed to by the internal list pointer. Subsequent calls will return the next resource object in the list. A null object is returned if list is empty or the end of list has been reached.

      • findResource

        public boolean findResource(Resource resource)
        Determines whether the Resource object is currently in the list.
        Parameters:
        resource -
        Returns:
        true if the resource is in the list, false otherwise.

      • findResourceByID

        public Resource findResourceByID(java.lang.String resourceID)
        Finds a resource in a list using the resourceID as the search key.
        Parameters:
        resourceID -
        Returns:
        if the current list object's resourceID matches the resourceID passed to the method, the Resource object is returned to the caller. Otherwise, returns null.
